title: Expert DevRel and Cloud-Native Engineer
description: Marino Wijay is a highly skilled professional with expertise in DevRel, Cloud-Native Open Source, DevOps, Kubernetes, Service Mesh and Networking. He is a platform advocate at Solo.io and profoundly understands the latest technologies. His ability to work seamlessly with different teams and technologies makes him an asset to any team. He is well known around DevRel Dojo and has a proven track record of creating and delivering high-quality content and building thriving communities. I highly recommend Marino for any DevRel, DevOps, Kubernetes, Service Mesh, and Networking-related roles.
